title: Blackwind Metropolis: A City in the Sky黑风城
author: z1250206733
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1007347938 于 2014-12-25 20:45 编辑 

作者原话：Hello Everyone!
Ninaman here, and as some of you may know, I have been working on this build, Blackwind Metropolis: A City in the Sky for a while now. After 4 months of work, it is finally completed! It has been so much fun to build, experiment, and learn from working on. 
楼主渣翻译：大家好 你们每个人！
Ninaman这里,你们中有些人可能知道,我一直在这工作构建、Blackwind大都市:现在天空中一个城市一段时间。经过4个月的工作,终于完成了!已经完成了这么多有趣的建设,实验,从工作中学习。
本人英语太渣翻译不出作品介绍 所以想看看有没有英语大触顺便翻译 万分感谢啊

The build itself consists of floating islands with factories, towns, a city, houses, fuel tanks, gears, power plants, and more. It also features a large mechanical bird! There is also a partial interior to the build including the main tower block of the city, a hanger, an airship assembly bay, a cockpit and interior of the bird, several houses, and part of the capitol airship. The build is all the style in general of steampunk, but more specifally a more "rusticpunk" and industrial vibe to it. The specific parts are: Village island 1, Village Island 2, Gear/Houses Island, Factory Island, Power plant island 1, Power plant island 2, Clock island, Power dome island, The Mechanical Bird, Skycity, The Capitol Ship, and other smaller airships, balloons, and biplanes.  
Wow. Big block of text there! Lore can be found below.

replies.author: wkh56566
replies.txt_content: LZ你确定不是机翻？我机翻的句子和你的一模一样诶

replies.author: z1250206733
replies.txt_content:
wkh56566 发表于 2014-12-24 20:17
LZ你确定不是机翻？我机翻的句子和你的一模一样诶
的确不是机翻 应为句子中有差异 例如Everyone 我机翻出来的是每个人都  人为翻译是你们每个人 here机翻是在这里 我没记错的话我们学的是here=这 连成句子是这里
